member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO
member.summary: The KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO structure contains the certificate information.

member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO.CertInfoSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO structure including the marshaled payload which is a structure of type specified in the InfoType parameter and immediately follows the KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO structure in contiguous memory.

member.name: KERB_CERTIFICATE_INFO.InfoType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that specifies the type of certificate information that is provided.
